title: Received a skin from mystery gift that i already have.
body: hello. so my friend mystery gifted me a while ago and to my surprised, i got an arcade miss fortune which i already have. can someone tell me what to do. can i send a ticket for a refund? reply asap pls. thank you guys

replies.body:
I took a look at your account and it seems you received a **Chroma** for Arcade Miss Fortune. Specifically it was the Peridot Chroma, which you can select in champ select to change her awesome colouring!

Let me know if you have any questions.
